title: Punk and its after shocks
creator_credit: Wolfgang Buld, Gerd Stein and GRF Productions
brief_description: Examines the emergence of punk in Britain during the early 1970’s, the bands that made Punk and the movements that Punk spawned including the ‘New Wave’ movement in music. Interviews band members and musicians who were involved in the punk movement and includes clips of the Sex Pistols, The Clash, The Jam, The Police, Madness, Ian Dury and The Kinks performing live.
